pageDescription: Please provide information about your property. This helps us understand its value and suitability for our services.

addressSearchSection.label: Enter your property address
addressSearchSection.placeholder: e.g. 123 High Street, London, Greater London, SW1A 1AA
addressSearchSection.helpText: For best results, include street, town, county and postcode separated by commas
addressSearchSection.noAddressEntered: Please enter an address to continue

toasts.formError: Property type, status, bedrooms, bathrooms and condition are required
toasts.saveSuccessDescription: Your property details have been successfully saved.

validation.yearBuiltInFuture: Year built cannot be in the future
validation.estimatedValueRequired: Please enter the estimated property value

guideBot.title: Your Srenova Guide
guideBot.initialMessage: Providing accurate information about your property helps us give you the most relevant recommendations. Don't worry if you don't know all the details - you can always update this information later.

suggestedQuestions.valuation: How will my property be valued?
suggestedQuestions.nextSteps: What happens after I submit this information?
suggestedQuestions.photoRequirement: Do I need to provide photos?
suggestedQuestions.propertyValuation: How will my property be valued?

responses.property_valuation: We use a combination of your provided information, local market data, and professional valuation methods to assess your property's value. This helps us give you the most accurate and competitive offer.
responses.next_steps: After submitting your property information, our team will review the details and may schedule a property inspection if needed. We'll then provide you with personalised recommendations and a provisional offer.
responses.photo_requirement: While not mandatory, providing photos helps us better understand your property's condition and features. This can lead to more accurate valuations and faster processing of your application.
responses.propertyValuation: We use a combination of your provided information, local market data, and professional valuation methods to assess your property's value. This helps us give you the most accurate and competitive offer.
responses.nextSteps: After submitting your property information, our team will review the details and may schedule a property inspection if needed. We'll then provide you with personalised recommendations and a provisional offer.
responses.photoRequirement: While not mandatory, providing photos helps us better understand your property's condition and features. This can lead to more accurate valuations and faster processing of your application.

valuationTips.title: Property Valuation Tips
valuationTips.description: Understanding the true value of your home can help you make more informed decisions. Here are a few ways to get a clearer picture.

tip1.title: Recent sales
tip1.description: Check recent sales of similar properties in your area

tip2.title: Condition matters
tip2.description: Note any recent renovations or issues that might affect value

tip3.title: Be realistic
tip3.description: Use online valuation tools as a guide, but be aware they may not be fully accurate

chatbot.title: AI Chat Assistant
chatbot.initialMessage: I can help you answer questions about the property information process. What would you like to know?

suggestedQuestions.property_type: What types of properties are eligible?
suggestedQuestions.mortgage: What if I have an outstanding mortgage?
suggestedQuestions.required_repairs: Who is responsible for property maintenance and repairs?
suggestedQuestions.renovations: Can I make renovations or modify my home?
